summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1425, for the improvement of Twenty-eighth Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from East Spruce Street to East Cherry Street, by laying water mains of proper dimensions, together with all gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants, and other appurtenances necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 15521 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
